channel.title: Glue Data Catalog on rmoff's random ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Glue Data Catalog on rmoff's random ramblings

item.title: Writing to Apache Iceberg on S3 using Flink SQL with Glue catalog
item.description: In this blog post I’ll show how you can use Flink SQL to write to Iceberg on S3, storing metadata about the Iceberg tables in the AWS Glue Data Catalog. First off, I’ll walk through the dependencies and a simple smoke-test, and then put it into practice using it to write data from a Kafka topic to Iceberg.
